Package parsing

Class UcdParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • parsing.UcdParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExceptionCheckProvider

    public class UcdParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExceptionCheckProvider
    Helper class that provides specific method for handling .ucd file.

      • extractBetween

        public java.lang.String extractBetween​(java.lang.String beginToken,
                                       java.lang.String endToken)
        find the first group of text that is between two identifier (tokens).
        Parameters:
        beginToken - left tag
        endToken - right tag
        Returns:
        the string that is between the two tags.

      • convertIdEntry

        public IdentifierEntry convertIdEntry​(java.lang.String expectedTag)
        Divides a section of the .ucd file into it's tag and it's content. Throws an exception if the expected value does not match the actual value
        Parameters:
        expectedTag - the expected value of the tag
        Returns:
        Throws:
        MalformedFileException - when the actual tag and the expected value does not match.

        Returns:

      • splitAttributeList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> splitAttributeList​()
        Splits the attributes list in respect to keeping Type within parameterizec types coeherent. As such, it will not split on the comma in 
        Map
        .
        Returns:
        A list of all attributes

      • splitList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> splitList​()
        Splits text based on GrammarModel.LIST_SEPERATOR separator and ignores tokens in between parenthesis.

        ex. : \tnombre_saisons() : Integer, change_statut(st : String, i : int) : void

        will only split in two parts :
        • nombre_saisons() : Integer
        • change_statut(st : String, i : int) : void
        Returns:
        the list of all split elements

      • extractAttributes

        public java.lang.String extractAttributes​()
        Extract the string representing the Attribute list from a class content string. Used by the ClassContent.tokenize(UmlContext, String) to get the classes attributes.
        Returns:
        the String with
        Throws:
        MalformedFileException - if the Attribute tag is there more than once in the body

      • extractOperations

        public java.lang.String extractOperations​()
        Extract the string representing the Operation list from a class content string. Used by the ClassContent.tokenize(UmlContext, String) to get the classes methods.
        Returns:
        the String with all operation

      • extractArgList

        Returns:

      • removeNewLines

        public static java.lang.String removeNewLines​(java.lang.String txt)
        removes all GrammarModel.NEW_LINE_TOKEN from a String.
        Parameters:
        txt - the String to operate on
        Returns:
        a clean text without any new line token

      • replaceNewLines

        public static java.lang.String replaceNewLines​(java.lang.String txt)
        Replaces custom GrammarModel.NEW_LINE_TOKEN with regule "\\n"
        Parameters:
        txt - the String to operate on
        Returns:
        a clean String where new line tokens have been replace with standard "backslash n"

      • getOperationId

        public java.lang.String getOperationId​()
        From a correctly formatted String, extract the text before the first opening parentheses. This is usually used to extract the name of a method.
        Returns:
        The extracted String
